書名: 雲林縣民間文學集1—閩南語故事集（一）

段: 臭頭洪武若講話攏喝水會堅凍。彼苦苓仔著無呼，伊較早是攏[立+店]這影e5得歇涼毋呼，啊伊攏卜死過年毋呼，啊伊攏歇涼。啊彼苦苓仔子伊會ka1 nia1共壓著彼臭頭庀毋呼。「哦！你這苦苓！你會共我戡到歸頭殼uah8卜痛死，卜予你死過年！」啊若彼苦苓若卜過年的時攏愛死，正月這暫來才擱發芛。

Chhau3-thau5 Hong5-bu2 na7 kong2-oe7 long2 hoah chui2 e7 kian-tang3.  He khou2-leng7-a2 tioh8 bo5 honnh, i khah-cha2 si7 long2 tiam3 che ng2--e5 teh hioh-liang5 m7 honnh, ah i long2 beh si2 koe3-ni5--m7 honnh, ah i long2 hioh-liang5.  Ah he khou2-leng7-a2 kiann2 i e7 ka-nia ka7 teh tioh8 he chhau3-thau5-phi2--m7 honnh.  “Ouh! li2 che khou2-leng7!  Li2 e7 ka7 goa2 tiam kau3 kui thau5-khak oah8 beh thiann3--si2, beh hou7 li2 si2 koe3-ni5!”  Ah na7 he khou2-leng7 na7 beh koe3-ni5 e5 si5 long2 ai3 si2, chiann--goeh8 chit cham7 lai5 chiah koh hoat-inn2.
